pages.text: A {b beverage vending machine} is used for selling or distributing drinks as well as other fluids. It accepts a preset number of {i asses} to dispense a portion (250mB) of fluid.

Only the owner can check out the GUIs of his beverage vending machines. To use a machine, other players should firstly right-click it with enough {i asses} to have the machine activated, then again right-click the machine with a container, which will fill the container with the fluid served.
The owner can set the price of fluid portions (in {i asses}), retrieve the coins, as well as restock the fluid.
